body:
Comment 16 by **huseby@lindenlab.com**: 
Running the latest tip, without the patch above, and running it with GOGCTRACE=1, I get
the crash.  These are the last few lines of output before the crash:

gc60339(8): 0+0+0 ms, 1 -> 0 MB 10721 -> 683 (128080926-128080243) objects, 2(10)
handoff, 32(333) steal, 283/138/6 yields
gc60340(8): 0+0+0 ms, 0 -> 0 MB 684 -> 682 (128080928-128080246) objects, 12(491)
handoff, 42(827) steal, 315/131/4 yields
gc60341(8): 0+0+0 ms, 0 -> 0 MB 686 -> 664 (128080934-128080270) objects, 7(433)
handoff, 42(702) steal, 309/148/9 yields
gc60342(8): 0+0+0 ms, 0 -> 0 MB 670 -> 665 (128080942-128080277) objects, 12(474)
handoff, 29(648) steal, 318/154/7 yields
gc60343(8): 0+0+0 ms, 0 -> 0 MB 675 -> 665 (128080953-128080288) objects, 3(20) handoff,
34(744) steal, 278/106/4 yields
gc60344(8): 0+0+0 ms, 0 -> 0 MB 709 -> 652 (128080997-128080345) objects, 16(499)
handoff, 31(559) steal, 365/186/9 yields
unexpected fault address 0xe7f7d752
fatal error: fault
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0xe7f7d752 pc=0x805178b]
